# has-id-selector

Check to see if a CSS selector string has an id.

## Installation

```bash
npm install --save has-id-selector
```

## Usage

```javascript
var hasIdSelector = require('has-id-selector')

hasIdSelector('#foobar') // => true
hasIdSelector('.foobar') // => false
```
